Numina | Multiple positions | Brooklyn, NY | Full-time | ONSITE

Numina’s mission is to make cities more responsive, so they are safer, healthier, and more equitable for the people who live in them. We make a hardware and software computer vision platform that senses bicycle, pedestrian, and other street traffic and delivers real-time intelligence — without surveillance — to help urban planners and municipal governments design better streets and public places.

We have openings in computer vision / machine learning, front-end, back-end, and embedded software (Linux). We're a small team but we're working on some really big, interesting problems! Job details and application instructions here: http://www.numina.co/careers/

Also feel free to reach out to me directly: ilan [at] numina [dot] co.
